description: Detects a suspicious Microsoft desktopimgdownldr file creation that stores a file to a suspicious location or contains a file with a suspicious extension Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
name: Suspicious Desktopimgdownldr Target File
